body:
This weapon bypasses all armor. The wielder can expend one use of legendary power when attacking to make the attack against touch AC. If she instead expends two uses of legendary power, the weapon also bypasses any deflection bonus to AC the target has.

An item must be a weapon and be a minor or major artifact to have this ability.
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Legendary Items/Legendary Item Abilities/Unstoppable Strike
name: Unstoppable Strike
